title: Determine the Principal Quantum Number
text: The quantum number $$n$$ tells us that the electron is in the 4th energy level.

title: Determine the Corresponding Orbital
text: Match the angular momentum quantum number to the corresponding orbital. For reference, l $$=$$ 0: s orbital, $$l=1$$: $$p$$ orbital, $$l=2$$: $$d$$ orbital, $$l=3$$: f orbital, etc.
